banner_title: Provide your customers with precious metals asset class
banner_sub_title: We’ve made it easy, secure and efficient for you and your customers
providers_title: WE GET YOU THE BEST PRICES FROM OUR MARKET PROVIDERS
services_value_1_description: FIX or REST API are available to integrate your platform or, we offer a cloud-based service if you don’t want to integrate
services_value_2_description: Select what metals, formats, vaults, and currencies you want to offer your customers
services_value_3_description: From over 12 liquidity providers giving you market depth, low price and spreads.
services_value_4_description: 24,7 prices and order management – we provide a 24,7 service
services_value_5_description: We offer a large range of currencies and vaults to support global customers
services_value_6_description: You’ll get a login to your dashboard that will show you all the details you need for reconciliation
services_value_7_description: Account manager and tech integration teams will be allocated to get you setup and operating
services_value_8_description: We provide ethically sourced, investment grade bullion from approved refineries to give your customers peace of mind
